title: Launch In-Game Seasonal Event
description: An agent needs to activate a planned in-game seasonal event (e.g., a Halloween event) across all game servers.

tasks.description: Verify the event start time and the list of event-specific assets (e.g., new items, map decorations).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all event parameters and assets are correct.

tasks.description: Push the 'Halloween Event' configuration to all active game servers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the event configuration globally.

tasks.description: Post an announcement about the event on the game's official social media channels and community forums.
